## Public Static Functions

### isSectionAtomizableBySymbols() {#ab4ef3ac1427687f11d30de588a790122}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool MCAsmInfoDarwin::isSectionAtomizableBySymbols (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsection">MCSection</a> &amp; Section)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
True if the section is atomized using the symbols in it.

This is false if the section is atomized based on its contents (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/macho">MachO</a>&#39; &#95;&#95;TEXT,&#95;&#95;cstring for example).
